languageSpecifications.done4: , С Lite версии вы можете общаться друг с другом партии, в течение более чем одной партии , вы должны купить Pro версию.
languageSpecifications.contactaddtxt: RU Fill in the details for the contact you will added. His UID, Nick name so you remember, extra note for the receiver. and press Send Request. The receiver will get message you will make a link with him. He can accept or cancel request, if accept the new contact will be added to your list. If you don't have somebody you can Add TEST contact.
languageSpecifications.learnhowtouse:
EN Learn how to use SSLNote
by taking this quick tour.
languageSpecifications.howtogetsupporttext: EN How to get support anonymous? click 'Add support contact' and the support contact will be added to your contact list. Send like a normal message 'the key is set automatic' so support can read and answer to the message. if you done you can remove the support contact from your list. Support will never send you message only will reply!
languageSpecifications.howtogetsupportalert:
EN SUPPORT ADDED SUCCESSFULLY
Now you can chat secure with us if you have some bugs - tips or else. Whene you don't want SUPPORT anymore you can delete the contact to swipe from right to left.
